message: Epstein’s lawyers to put together a plea deal that required the financier to plead guilty to two prostitution charges and serve 13 months in prison, despite overwhelming evidence of a widespread pattern of sex trafficking and sexual assault, and 103 “Jane Doe” victims.

data.description: Donald Trump’s secretary of labor, who was previously a federal prosecutor, broke the law in a plea deal with a multimillionaire sex trafficker, according to the federal judge's ruling.
data.title: Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficked underage girls and Trump’s secretary of Lalegally kept plea deal from victims
